GroupCrcList.description: Show Inventory components CRC values and allow to change for BIOS to post inventory in next system boot.
GroupCrcList.longDescription: Show Inventory components CRC values and allow to change for BIOS to post inventory in next system boot.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CERTIFICATE.longDescription: This element corresponds to all data related to CERTIFICATE CRC.

CPU.longDescription: This element corresponds to all data related to Processor CRC.

DIMM.longDescription: This element corresponds to all data related to Memory CRC.

PCIE.longDescription: This element corresponds to all data related to Storage, PCIeDevices CRC.

SECUREBOOT.longDescription: This element corresponds to all data related to SecureBoot CRC.

InventoryCRC.description: The Inventorycrc schema represents a components CRC values such as DIMM, CPU, PCIE, Certificate, Secureboot.
InventoryCRC.longDescription: The Inventorycrc schema represents a components CRC values such as DIMM, CPU, PCIE, Certificate, Secureboot.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
